levels.description:
Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP, deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to up to 6 surrounding enemies and <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> them for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</>s; if an enemy is already <$ba.sluggish>Slowed</>, then <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</>s
<@ba.rem>Can store {ct} charges</>
